title: RIOT LOGO
body: I was inspired by league of legends and riot to make this logo on my wall , i worked this whole weekend and it turned out so perfect , as machine made it , but i made it only with my hands...  it is 2.5 meters length and 1.5 meters widely . i would like to be at summoner showcase on sunday  on the finals. thanks in advance and do an even better job than you do now and make the best game in the world cause because this is the best  game! :D

replies.body: Awesome!  Did you just edit it into a workable vector in Illustrator?
